tasks.title: Add AM Cash Count Viewer to FOH WATCHDOG
tasks.description: Add password-protected tab in FOH WATCHDOG to view AM cash count data at any time of day
tasks.outcome: Successfully added AM CASH tab with full functionality. User can now view AM count details including drawer breakdowns at any time.

tasks.title: Smart CASH Button with Time-Based Routing
tasks.description: Merge AM Count and PM Close into one smart CASH button that automatically routes based on time (7AM-7PM = AM, 7PM-2AM = PM) with password protection
tasks.outcome: Smart CASH button working with password 'jaynacash', 30-min session, automatic time-based flow selection

tasks.title: Fix FOH Delete Checklist Overlay Errors
tasks.description: Fix modal overlay removal errors causing null reference errors
tasks.outcome: Added unique IDs to modals, created safe removal functions with null checks

tasks.title: Remove Hardcoded FOH Checklist Filtering
tasks.description: Fix custom checklists not appearing in CHECKLISTS tab due to hardcoded filtering
tasks.outcome: Changed to database-driven loading, all checklists now load dynamically
